mapper.select: SELECT id, category, title, writer_name, content, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(edit_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as edit_date FROM document WHERE category=#{category} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{limitStart}, #{listCount};
SELECT id, category, title, writer_name, content, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(edit_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as edit_date FROM document WHERE category=#{category} AND id=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM document WHERE category=#{category}
mapper.insert: insert into document (title, content, category, reg_date, edit_date, writer_name) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{category}, now(), now(), #{writerName})
